input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
ValuePack (2 Count): Digital Replacement Camera and Camcorder Battery for Canon BP-718, BP-709, BP-727 - Includes Lens Pouch

Product keywords:
Includes TWO Compatible Rechargeable Lithium Ion Digital Batteries With No Memory Effect and ONE Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch 15 X 24 Centimeters.
18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Engineered and Manufactured Under European Standard ISO 9001. Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products.
1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, ROHS Compliant.
Protective Retail Packaging, Each Product is wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging.
Exclusive Offering of High Performance, Long Lasting, and Durable Grade A Cell Battery
Meets and exceeds high-priced OEM products, allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price
Compatibilities: Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. 
Battery models: BP-709, BP709, BP-727 BP727

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This ValuePack includes two long-lasting rechargeable lithium-ion batteries for your Canon camera or camcorder. Each battery is guaranteed to meet or exceed the performance of the original battery while offering a fraction of the price.  The batteries are also protected by a durable and stylish leatherette pouch.  This ValuePack comes with 18 months manufacturer warranty.
input_text.Response B: This is an exclusive offering of High Performance, Long Lasting, and Durable Grade A Cell Battery. It is compatible with the following Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. It includes protective retail packaging and each product is wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging. The battery models are BP-709, BP-727, and BP-727. This battery is engineered and manufactured under European Standard ISO 9001. It is guaranteed to meet or even exceed high-priced OEM products while allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price. It is 1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, and ROHS Compliant.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
